command.name: reset-connector
command.label: Reset connector
command.description: Reset entire service map for one connector. Full reset also clears the can-decode list (by default only cannot-decode is cleared).

command.name: reset-service
command.label: Reset service id
command.description: Reset one service for all connectors in profile (use hex sid, sid:ident or sid:chid format, e.g: 0000, 0000:000000 or 0000:0000).

command.name: retry-connector
command.label: Retry connector
command.description: Attempt reconnect for a connector (temporarily enables connector if disabled).

command.name: disable-connector
command.label: Disable connector
command.description: Temporarily disable a connector (until next config load or manual retry).

command.name: set-profile-debug
command.label: Set profile debug
command.description: Temporarily sets debug flag for one or all profile (setting to false deletes user transaction logs).

command.name: set-user-debug
command.label: Set user debug
command.description: Temporarily sets debug flag for one user (true enables log-emm, log-ecm, log-zap etc - for that user only).

command.name: kick-user
command.label: Kick user
command.description: Close all sessions for selected user.

command.name: osd-message
command.label: Send osd message
command.description: Send mgcamd OSD message to selected user.

command.name: remove-failed
command.label: Remove failed logins matching wildcard
command.description: Remove entries from the login-failures log that matches the specified glob mask (e.g: *, usr* or *@192.168.0.*).

command.name: gen-keystore
command.label: Generate keystore
command.description: Create a java keystore file with a self-signed certificate for SSL (will attempt to use keytool from current jre installation).

command.name: clear-warnings
command.label: Clear warnings
command.description: Clear all user transaction warning events.
